remarks: A function ` F : J --> K ` from a compactly generated space is continuous iff for all compact spaces ` z ` and continuous ` g : z --> J ` , the composite ` F o. g : z --> K ` is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
kgencn2 $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) -> ( F e. ( ( kGen ` J ) Cn K ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. z e. Comp A. g e. ( z Cn J ) ( F o. g ) e. ( z Cn K ) ) ) ) $.
$d F g z $.
$d J g z $.
$d K g z $.
$d X g z $.
$d Y g z $.
